body:
[Poster]: There's a poster of a blue-haired anime girl hanging in the wall, she seem's familiar despite the non-latin characters written by her side. 

[1]: "Maybe she's a rockstar" 
[2] [Inspect further] 
[3] [Leave the poster be]
title: Start1

body:
[Poster]: Maybe she is. Or at least some sort of artist. 

[1]: [Inspect further] 
[2]: [Leave the poster be]
title: Rockstar

body:
[Clairvoyance]: "The characters are in Japanese, they read 'Hatsune Miku'." You are not sure what that means nor how you know what they read, but you enjoy the art. 

[1]: [Leave the poster be]
title: Inspect
